text.text_translated: Zoos bring people and animals together. They can do good things. They can teach people about problems for animals. They can encourage people to protect animals. They can also encourage people to protect the places where animals live. Some zoos give a safe place to animals. These animals were hurt in circuses. Or people left their pets alone. Zoos also do important studies. For example, they study how animals act. They also study how to help sick animals.

Some zoos give a safe place to animals. These animals were hurt in circuses. Or people left their pets alone. Zoos also do important studies. For example, they study how animals act.
